verses.verse: וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> And Jacob בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land מְגוּרֵ֣י <WH4033> was a stranger אָבִ֑יו <WH1> wherein his father בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <WH428> These תֹּלְד֣וֹת <WH8435> These [are] the generations יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> of Jacob יוֹסֵ֞ף <WH3130> Joseph בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁבַֽע־ <WH7651> seven עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become רֹעֶ֤ה <WH7462> was feeding אֶת־ <WH854> with אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> with his brethren בַּצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> the flock וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he נַ֗עַר <WH5288> and the lad אֶת־ <WH854> with בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> [was] with the sons בִלְהָ֛ה <WH1090> of Bilhah וְאֶת־ <WH854> for בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and with the sons זִלְפָּ֖ה <WH2153> of Zilpah נְשֵׁ֣י <WH802> wives אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father's וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> brought יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> and Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבָּתָ֥ם <WH1681> report רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> their evil אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> unto his father

וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Now Israel אָהַ֤ב <WH157> loved אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> Joseph מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> more than all his children כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because בֶן־ <WH1121> because he [was] the son זְקֻנִ֥ים <WH2208> of his old age ה֖וּא <WH1931> he ל֑וֹ וְעָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> and he made ל֖וֹ כְּתֹ֥נֶת <WH3801> him a coat פַּסִּֽים׃ <WH6446> of [many] colours

וַיִּרְא֣וּ <WH7200> saw אֶחָ֗יו <WH251> And when his brethren כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֹת֞וֹ <WH853> אָהַ֤ב <WH157> loved אֲבִיהֶם֙ <WH1> that their father מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> him more than all his brethren וַֽיִּשְׂנְא֖וּ <WH8130> they hated אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָכְל֖וּ <WH3201> him and could דַּבְּר֥וֹ <WH1696> not speak לְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <WH7965> peaceably

וַיַּחֲלֹ֤ם <WH2492> dreamed יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph חֲל֔וֹם <WH2472> a dream וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <WH5046> and he told לְאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> [it] his brethren וַיּוֹסִ֥פוּ <WH3254> him yet the more ע֖וֹד <WH5750> even שְׂנֹ֥א <WH8130> and they hated אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> about שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> unto them Hear נָ֕א <WH4994> Please הַחֲל֥וֹם <WH2492> which I have dreamed הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> to this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָלָֽמְתִּי׃ <WH2492> have had

וְ֠הִנֵּה <WH2009> behold אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <WH587> we מְאַלְּמִ֤ים <WH481> were binding אֲלֻמִּים֙ <WH485> sheaves בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> hope הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and lo קָ֥מָה <WH6965> arose אֲלֻמָּתִ֖י <WH485> and lo my sheaf וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also נִצָּ֑בָה <WH5324> and also stood upright וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold תְסֻבֶּ֙ינָה֙ <WH5437> stood round about אֲלֻמֹּ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH485> and behold your sheaves וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖יןָ <WH7812> and made obeisance לַאֲלֻמָּתִֽי׃ <WH485> to my sheaf

וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> said לוֹ֙ אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> And his brethren הֲמָלֹ֤ךְ <WH4427> to him Shalt thou indeed תִּמְלֹךְ֙ <WH4427> reign עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> over אִם־ <WH518> Or מָשׁ֥וֹל <WH4910> over us? or shalt thou indeed תִּמְשֹׁ֖ל <WH4910> have dominion בָּ֑נוּ וַיּוֹסִ֤פוּ <WH3254> him yet the more עוֹד֙ <WH5750> even שְׂנֹ֣א <WH8130> over us? And they hated אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> over חֲלֹמֹתָ֖יו <WH2472> for his dreams וְעַל־ <WH5921> over דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <WH1697> and for his words

וַיַּחֲלֹ֥ם <WH2492> And he dreamed עוֹד֙ <WH5750> still חֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> dream אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> yet another וַיְסַפֵּ֥ר <WH5608> and told אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לְאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> it his brethren וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Lo חָלַ֤מְתִּֽי <WH2492> Behold I have dreamed חֲלוֹם֙ <WH2472> a dream ע֔וֹד <WH5750> still וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> and behold הַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ <WH8121> more and behold the sun וְהַיָּרֵ֗חַ <WH3394> and the moon וְאַחַ֤ד <WH259> a עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> ten כּֽוֹכָבִ֔ים <WH3556> stars מִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֖ים <WH7812> made obeisance לִֽי׃

וַיְסַפֵּ֣ר <WH5608> And he told אֶל־ <WH413> to אָבִיו֮ <WH1> [it] to his father וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to אֶחָיו֒ <WH251> and to his brethren וַיִּגְעַר־ <WH1605> rebuked בּ֣וֹ אָבִ֔יו <WH1> and his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> him and said ל֔וֹ מָ֛ה <WH4100> What הַחֲל֥וֹם <WH2472> unto him What [is] this dream הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that חָלָ֑מְתָּ <WH2492> that thou hast dreamed הֲב֣וֹא <WH935> indeed נָב֗וֹא <WH935> come אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I וְאִמְּךָ֣ <WH517> ? Shall I and thy mother וְאַחֶ֔יךָ <WH251> and thy brethren לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֥ת <WH7812> to bow down לְךָ֖ אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> common
וַיְקַנְאוּ־ <WH7065> envied ב֖וֹ אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> And his brethren וְאָבִ֖יו <WH1> him but his father שָׁמַ֥ר <WH8104> observed אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> the saying
וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> went אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> And his brethren לִרְע֛וֹת <WH7462> to feed אֶׅתׅ־ <WH853> צֹ֥אן <WH6629> flock אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <WH1> their father's בִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH7927> in Shechem

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> And Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> unto Joseph הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> are not אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> Do not thy brethren רֹעִ֣ים <WH7462> feed בִּשְׁכֶ֔ם <WH7927> Shechem לְכָ֖ה <WH1980> and I וְאֶשְׁלָחֲךָ֣ <WH7971> and I will send thee אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> to וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> unto them And he said ל֖וֹ הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> will go

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said ל֗וֹ לֶךְ־ <WH1980> Go נָ֨א <WH4994> now רְאֵ֜ה <WH7200> I pray thee see אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁל֤וֹם <WH7965> whether it be well אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> with thy brethren וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> and well הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> with the flocks וַהֲשִׁבֵ֖נִי <WH7725> again דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> me word וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7971> So he sent מֵעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> him out of the vale חֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> of Hebron וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and he came שְׁכֶֽמָה׃ <WH7927> to Shechem

וַיִּמְצָאֵ֣הוּ <WH4672> found him אִ֔ישׁ <WH582> him וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold תֹעֶ֖ה <WH8582> and behold [he was] wandering בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> in the field וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֧הוּ <WH7592> asked him הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH582> another לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying מַה־ <WH4100> What תְּבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH1245> What seekest

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֶת־ <WH853> אַחַ֖י <WH251> my brethren אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <WH1245> I seek הַגִּֽידָה־ <WH5046> tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> please לִ֔י אֵיפֹ֖ה <WH375> me I pray thee where הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they רֹעִֽים׃ <WH7462> they feed

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> And the man נָסְע֣וּ <WH5265> They are departed מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> hence כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> for I heard אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <WH559> them say נֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> go דֹּתָ֑יְנָה <WH1886> to Dothan וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph אַחַ֣ר <WH310> after אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> his brethren וַיִּמְצָאֵ֖ם <WH4672> and found בְּדֹתָֽן׃ <WH1886> them in Dothan

וַיִּרְא֥וּ <WH7200> And when they saw אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> מֵרָחֹ֑ק <WH7350> him afar off וּבְטֶ֙רֶם֙ <WH2962> and before יִקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> even before he came near אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to וַיִּֽתְנַכְּל֥וּ <WH5230> unto them they conspired אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH4191> against him to slay

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אָחִ֑יו <WH251> to another הִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> Here בַּ֛עַל <WH1167> archer הַחֲלֹמ֥וֹת <WH2472> dream הַלָּזֶ֖ה <WH1976> Behold this בָּֽא׃ <WH935> cometh

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6258> Now לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> come וְנַֽהַרְגֵ֗הוּ <WH2026> now therefore and let us slay וְנַשְׁלִכֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7993> him and cast בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> him into some הַבֹּר֔וֹת <WH953> pit וְאָמַ֕רְנוּ <WH559> and we will say חַיָּ֥ה <WH2416> beast רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> Some evil אֲכָלָ֑תְהוּ <WH398> hath devoured וְנִרְאֶ֕ה <WH7200> him and we shall see מַה־ <WH4100> what יִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> will become חֲלֹמֹתָֽיו׃ <WH2472> what will become of his dreams

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> And Reuben וַיַּצִּלֵ֖הוּ <WH5337> [it] and he delivered מִיָּדָ֑ם <WH3027> him out of their hands וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נַכֶּ֖נּוּ <WH5221> take נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> his life

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH413> about רְאוּבֵן֮ <WH7205> And Reuben אַל־ <WH3808> not תִּשְׁפְּכוּ־ <WH8210> unto them Shed דָם֒ <WH1818> no blood הַשְׁלִ֣יכוּ <WH7993> [but] cast אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about הַבּ֤וֹר <WH953> him into this pit הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> is in בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> that [is] in the wilderness וְיָ֖ד <WH3027> no hand אַל־ <WH408> no תִּשְׁלְחוּ־ <WH7971> and lay ב֑וֹ לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> might הַצִּ֤יל <WH5337> upon him that he might rid אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> מִיָּדָ֔ם <WH3027> him out of their hands לַהֲשִׁיב֖וֹ <WH7725> again אֶל־ <WH413> to אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> him to his father

וַֽיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֥א <WH935> was come יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> And it came to pass when Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> unto his brethren וַיַּפְשִׁ֤יטוּ <WH6584> stripped אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> כֻּתָּנְתּ֔וֹ <WH3801> his coat אֶת־ <WH853> כְּתֹ֥נֶת <WH3801> [his] coat הַפַּסִּ֖ים <WH6446> of [many] colours אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and they

וַיִּ֨קָּחֻ֔הוּ <WH3947> And they took וַיַּשְׁלִ֥כוּ <WH7993> him and cast אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> הַבֹּ֑רָה <WH953> him into a pit וְהַבּ֣וֹר <WH953> and the pit רֵ֔ק <WH7386> [was] empty אֵ֥ין <WH369> without בּ֖וֹ מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> [there was] no water

וַיֵּשְׁבוּ֮ <WH3427> And they sat down לֶֽאֱכָל־ <WH398> to eat לֶחֶם֒ <WH3899> bread וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> and they lifted up עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <WH5869> their eyes וַיִּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> behold אֹרְחַ֣ת <WH736> and behold a company יִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֔ים <WH3459> of Ishmeelites בָּאָ֖ה <WH935> came מִגִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> from Gilead וּגְמַלֵּיהֶ֣ם <WH1581> with their camels נֹֽשְׂאִ֗ים <WH5375> bearing נְכֹאת֙ <WH5219> spicery וּצְרִ֣י <WH6875> and balm וָלֹ֔ט <WH3910> and myrrh הוֹלְכִ֖ים <WH1980> going לְהוֹרִ֥יד <WH3381> to carry [it] down מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4714> to Egypt

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> And Judah אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> unto his brethren מַה־ <WH4100> What בֶּ֗צַע <WH1215> What profit כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נַהֲרֹג֙ <WH2026> [is it] if we slay אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִ֔ינוּ <WH251> our brother וְכִסִּ֖ינוּ <WH3680> and conceal אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמֽוֹ׃ <WH1818> bloodshed

לְכ֞וּ <WH1980> Come וְנִמְכְּרֶ֣נּוּ <WH4376> and let us sell לַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים <WH3459> him to the Ishmeelites וְיָדֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH3027> and let not our hand אַל־ <WH408> and not תְּהִי־ <WH1961> lay ב֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָחִ֥ינוּ <WH251> be upon him for he [is] our brother בְשָׂרֵ֖נוּ <WH1320> [and] our flesh ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> were content אֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> And his brethren

וַיַּֽעַבְרוּ֩ <WH5674> Then there passed אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH376> some מִדְיָנִ֜ים <WH4084> by Midianites סֹֽחֲרִ֗ים <WH5503> traders וַֽיִּמְשְׁכוּ֙ <WH4900> and they drew וַיַּֽעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> and lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> Joseph מִן־ <WH4480> out הַבּ֔וֹר <WH953> out of the pit וַיִּמְכְּר֧וּ <WH4376> and sold אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> Joseph לַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֖ים <WH3459> to the Ishmeelites בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> for twenty כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> [pieces] of silver וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <WH935> and they brought אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> Joseph מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4714> into Egypt

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> returned רְאוּבֵן֙ <WH7205> And Reuben אֶל־ <WH413> to הַבּ֔וֹר <WH953> unto the pit וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold אֵין־ <WH369> else יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> and behold Joseph בַּבּ֑וֹר <WH953> [was] not in the pit וַיִּקְרַ֖ע <WH7167> and he rent אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָֽיו׃ <WH899> his clothes

וַיָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> And he returned אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> unto his brethren וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said הַיֶּ֣לֶד <WH3206> The child אֵינֶ֔נּוּ <WH369> else וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> me אָ֥נָה <WH575> [is] not and I whither אֲנִי־ <WH589> shall I בָֽא׃ <WH935> shall I go

וַיִּקְח֖וּ <WH3947> And they took אֶת־ <WH853> כְּתֹ֣נֶת <WH3801> coat יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> Joseph's וַֽיִּשְׁחֲטוּ֙ <WH7819> and killed שְׂעִ֣יר <WH8163> a kid עִזִּ֔ים <WH5795> of the goats וַיִּטְבְּל֥וּ <WH2881> and dipped אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֻּתֹּ֖נֶת <WH3801> the coat בַּדָּֽם׃ <WH1818> in the blood

וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֞וּ <WH7971> And they sent אֶת־ <WH853> כְּתֹ֣נֶת <WH3801> the coat הַפַּסִּ֗ים <WH6446> of [many] colours וַיָּבִ֙יאוּ֙ <WH935> and they brought אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> [it] to their father וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and said זֹ֣את <WH2063> We מָצָ֑אנוּ <WH4672> This have we found הַכֶּר־ <WH5234> know נָ֗א <WH4994> please הַכְּתֹ֧נֶת <WH3801> coat בִּנְךָ֛ <WH1121> now whether it [be] thy son's הִ֖וא <WH1931> he אִם־ <WH518> or לֹֽא׃ <WH3808> not

וַיַּכִּירָ֤הּ <WH5234> And he knew it וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said כְּתֹ֣נֶת <WH3801> coat בְּנִ֔י <WH1121> [It is] my son's חַיָּ֥ה <WH2416> beast רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> an evil אֲכָלָ֑תְהוּ <WH398> hath devoured טָרֹ֥ף <WH2963> is without doubt טֹרַ֖ף <WH2963> rent in pieces יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> him Joseph

וַיִּקְרַ֤ע <WH7167> rent יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> And Jacob שִׂמְלֹתָ֔יו <WH8071> his clothes וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and put שַׂ֖ק <WH8242> sackcloth בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <WH4975> upon his loins וַיִּתְאַבֵּ֥ל <WH56> and mourned עַל־ <WH5921> for בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> for his son יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> many

וַיָּקֻמוּ֩ <WH6965> rose up כָל־ <WH3605> all בָּנָ֨יו <WH1121> And all his sons וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בְּנֹתָ֜יו <WH1323> and all his daughters לְנַחֲמ֗וֹ <WH5162> to comfort וַיְמָאֵן֙ <WH3985> him but he refused לְהִתְנַחֵ֔ם <WH5162> to be comforted וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and he said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely אֵרֵ֧ד <WH3381> For I will go down אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּנִ֛י <WH1121> unto my son אָבֵ֖ל <WH57> mourning שְׁאֹ֑לָה <WH7585> into the grave וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <WH1058> wept אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> Thus his father

וְהַ֨מְּדָנִ֔ים <WH4084> the Midianites מָכְר֥וּ <WH4376> sold אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> him into Egypt לְפֽוֹטִיפַר֙ <WH6318> unto Potiphar סְרִ֣יס <WH5631> an officer פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh's שַׂ֖ר <WH8269> [and] captain הַטַּבָּחִֽים׃ <WH2876> of the guard פ
